content: सौध {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (धी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [सुधया निर्मितं रक्तं वा अण्] {@--1@} Relating to, or having, nectar. {@--2@} Having plaster, or plastered. --धं {@--1@} A white-washed mansion, any stuccoed house. {@--2@} Any great mansion or palace, large house; सौधवासमुटजेन विस्मृतः संचिकाय फलनिःस्पृहस्तपः <ls>R. 19. 2</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 5</ls>, <ls n="R.">13. 40.</ls> {@--3@} Silver. {@--4@} Opal.
